import React from "react"; export default function Card(props){ const imagestyle = { maxHeight:"200px", maxwidth:"300px", width:"auto", display: "block", marginLeft: "auto", marginRight: "auto", marginTop:"10px" } return(

{props.name}

{props.price+ " INR"}

); }
